intro: Gethyllis lata, commonly known as the broadleaf starburster, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant features small, white or pale blue flowers that bloom in clusters, often resembling stars. Its leaves are broad and grass-like, and it thrives in well-drained, sandy soils. Gethyllis lata is typically found in coastal and mountainous regions, where it adapts to dry and sunny conditions.
